text: w'imma nrynnak -ayha alrswl- fi hyatk baed aladhi naeiduhm min aleiqab fi aldnya, 'aw natawafayanak qabl 'an nuriak dhlk fyhm, fa'iilayna whdna yarjie 'amrihim fi alhaltyn, thuma allah shahid ealaa afealhm alty kanuu yfelwnha fi aldnya, la yakhfaa ealayh shay' mnha, fyjazyhm biha jza'hm aldhy ysthqwnh
